description:
The Witness is an open-world puzzle game with dozens of locations
to explore and over 500 puzzles. Play the popular puzzle randomizer
by sigma144, with an added layer of progression randomization!

0.4.3-last.description:
There was a core API change that deprecates a function.
Moving to the new function means the apworld is no longer compatible with 0.4.3 installations.

This is the .apworld as of the last commit before the move to the new syntax. No more 0.4.3 compatible .apworlds will come out after this point.
0.4.3-last.title: Last 0.4.3 compatible apworld

0.4.5_beta5.description:
Include Trap Weights.
Improves regional hints for the client.

A new prerelease has been added on https://github.com/NewSoupVi/The-Witness-Randomizer-for-Archipelago/releases.

**Changes from Beta 4**

Includes Obelisk Keys feature.
Also some location renaming.

**Changes from Beta 3**

Regional hints were overcounting lasers in certain contexts. That's fixed now

**Changes from Beta 2**

Desert Laser Redirect Control (Panel) is an item now :)
Also some fixes.

**Changes from Beta 1**

Well this is here early isn't it?

There are a bunch of new features that didn't make it into 0.4.4 because I had a sudden surge of motivation during 0.4.4 feature freeze, lol.

To be used with the latest (pre)release of https://github.com/NewSoupVi/The-Witness-Randomizer-for-Archipelago/releases.

Features:

mountain_lasers now goes up to 11, the box gets rotated if you choose >=7
Progressive Symmetry (Symmetry -> Colored Dots)
A new type of hint: "Area hints". Example: "In the Quarry area, you will find 5 progression items. One of them is a laser."
There are also now location groups for the new "areas".
Death Link Amnesty
Bonk Trap
Option Presets (If you're running a webhost)
shuffle_lasers: local
More items get reclassified to "useful" if they don't unlock any checks
New control panels in Desert
0.4.5_beta5.title: 0.4.5 Beta 5

0.4.5_beta6.description:
Adds support for the Laser Hints feature: https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/2895

A new prerelease has been added on https://github.com/NewSoupVi/The-Witness-Randomizer-for-Archipelago/releases.

**Changes from Beta 5**

Include Trap Weights.
Improves regional hints for the client.

**Changes from Beta 4**

Includes Obelisk Keys feature.
Also some location renaming.

**Changes from Beta 3**

Regional hints were overcounting lasers in certain contexts. That's fixed now

**Changes from Beta 2**

Desert Laser Redirect Control (Panel) is an item now :)
Also some fixes.

**Changes from Beta 1**

Well this is here early isn't it?

There are a bunch of new features that didn't make it into 0.4.4 because I had a sudden surge of motivation during 0.4.4 feature freeze, lol.

To be used with the latest (pre)release of https://github.com/NewSoupVi/The-Witness-Randomizer-for-Archipelago/releases.

Features:

mountain_lasers now goes up to 11, the box gets rotated if you choose >=7
Progressive Symmetry (Symmetry -> Colored Dots)
A new type of hint: "Area hints". Example: "In the Quarry area, you will find 5 progression items. One of them is a laser."
There are also now location groups for the new "areas".
Death Link Amnesty
Bonk Trap
Option Presets (If you're running a webhost)
shuffle_lasers: local
More items get reclassified to "useful" if they don't unlock any checks
New control panels in Desert
0.4.5_beta6.title: 0.4.5 Beta 6

0.4.7p1.description:
**A lot of the features I want to make, including some of the ones in this apworld, are blocked by this PR that has been open for 4 months. If you have any ability to review it, I would be very grateful.**
https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/2698

New features and their associated PRs:
- Panel Hunt Mode https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3265
- Variety Rando https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3239
- Vague Hints https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/2921

Smaller Features or Changes:
- Add more panels to doors: panels mode https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/2916

Fixes/Refactor:
- Better plando workaround https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3041
- Logic fixes https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3212 https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3213
- Make use of OptionError https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3258
0.4.7p1.title: 0.4.7 Beta 1: Variety & Panel Hunt

0.5.0p10.description:
Add Panel Hunt Plando.
Fix same_area_discouragement_factor = 0 just not working correctly

**Changes from Prerelease 9**

Shuffle Dog.
Fix **normal** postgame not working correctly (I finally got panel hunt postgame to work but broke normal postgame. Lol)
Beyond that, it's hard to remember, I think mostly what I changed since last time was refactoring code that won't affect the player. But there's also some genuine fixes / changes, like e.g. Swamp Cyan Underwater Sliding Bridge Control being replaced with Swamp Sliding Bridge Control in Panel Hunt (and many similar cases)

**Changes from Prerelease 8**

Fixed 0.4.6 compatibility.

**Changes from Prerelease 7**

Additions:
A new option has been added: Panel Hunt Same Area Discouragement Factor.
This can be used to prevent areas with many panels (such as Treehouse or Caves) having too many hunt panels in them.

**Changes from Prerelease 6**

Changes:
- Updated puzzle logic to Variety 3.2.3

Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where Obelisks could be (uncompletable) hunt panels.

**Changes from Prerelease 5**

Fix panel hunt postgame again

**Changes from Prerelease 4**

Fix panel hunt postgame not working at all. Renamed the choices of the option to be clearer.

**Changes from Prerelease 3**

Fixed some symbol requirements.
Fixed panel hunt postgame not accounting for challenge timer and elevator start.
Disqualified PP reset panels from being hunt panels because it's confusing.

**Changes from Prerelease 2**

Fixes a potential slot bleed bug.
Fixes an item becoming useful despite locking a check.
Fixes Tutorial Gate EP existing as a check in panel hunt.

**Changes from Prerelease 1**

New features and their associated PRs:
- Panel Hunt Mode https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3265
- Variety Rando https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3239
- Vague Hints https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/2921

Smaller Features or Changes:
- Add more panels to doors: panels mode https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/2916

Fixes/Refactor:
- Better plando workaround https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3041
- Logic fixes https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3212 https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3213
- Make use of OptionError https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3258
0.5.0p10.title: 0.5.0 Beta 10: Panel Hunt Plando

Add "unlockable fast travel points" option, called `unlockable_warps` in the yaml.

It's got to do with, like, the "locked by:" feature on the client side. Dw too much about it

**Changes from Prerelease 11**

Fixed a fatal crash when trying to generate `panel_hunt_postgame: everything_is_eligible`

**Changes from Prerelease 10**

Add Panel Hunt Plando.
Fix same_area_discouragement_factor = 0 just not working correctly

**Changes from Prerelease 9**

Shuffle Dog.
Fix **normal** postgame not working correctly (I finally got panel hunt postgame to work but broke normal postgame. Lol)
Beyond that, it's hard to remember, I think mostly what I changed since last time was refactoring code that won't affect the player. But there's also some genuine fixes / changes, like e.g. Swamp Cyan Underwater Sliding Bridge Control being replaced with Swamp Sliding Bridge Control in Panel Hunt (and many similar cases)

**Changes from Prerelease 8**

Fixed 0.4.6 compatibility.

**Changes from Prerelease 7**

Additions:
A new option has been added: Panel Hunt Same Area Discouragement Factor.
This can be used to prevent areas with many panels (such as Treehouse or Caves) having too many hunt panels in them.

**Changes from Prerelease 6**

Changes:
- Updated puzzle logic to Variety 3.2.3

Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where Obelisks could be (uncompletable) hunt panels.

**Changes from Prerelease 5**

Fix panel hunt postgame again

**Changes from Prerelease 4**

Fix panel hunt postgame not working at all. Renamed the choices of the option to be clearer.

**Changes from Prerelease 3**

Fixed some symbol requirements.
Fixed panel hunt postgame not accounting for challenge timer and elevator start.
Disqualified PP reset panels from being hunt panels because it's confusing.

**Changes from Prerelease 2**

Fixes a potential slot bleed bug.
Fixes an item becoming useful despite locking a check.
Fixes Tutorial Gate EP existing as a check in panel hunt.

**Changes from Prerelease 1**

New features and their associated PRs:
- Panel Hunt Mode https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3265
- Variety Rando https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3239
- Vague Hints https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/2921

Smaller Features or Changes:
- Add more panels to doors: panels mode https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/2916

Fixes/Refactor:
- Better plando workaround https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3041
- Logic fixes https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3212 https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3213
- Make use of OptionError https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3258

0.5.1p18.title: 0.5.1 Beta 18: Fix Variety Panel Hunt + ProgUseful Items

Playtest10b.description:
Tentative title: "Doors & Speed Update". Use with the [Prerelease Client](https://github.com/NewSoupVi/The-Witness-Randomizer-for-Archipelago/releases/tag/energy-playtest-v1.0b_real).

- Speed boosts are reworked. You now gain charge completing checks, until you have enough for a manually deployable speed boost. Receive capacity upgrades to hold multiple speed boosts at once.
- Door Shuffle is now split into 2 settings: One for door type (panel, doors, mixed) and one for regional grouping.
    - All previous modes are still playable. For "panels", choose panels & off. For "doors_complex", choose doors & off. For "doors_simple", choose doors & regional. For "max", choose mixed & off.
- Shuffle Boat is its own option now independent of your doors setting.
- New setting that makes it so more Bridges / Elevators come to you when you walk up to them, namely Bunker Elevator, Swamp Long Bridge and Quarry Elevator, allowing new types of early / backwards access.
- Early Caves now has a new option choice: "Add to pool". This will add the "Caves Shortcuts" item into the randomized item pool instead of your starting inventory.
Playtest10b.title: Witness 0.4.3 Beta (1.0b)

witnessv9.0.0p2.description:
Fixed Tutorial First Hallway Bend always being added as a check, no matter the options.

**Prerelease 1 changelog**

Includes the following PRs:

"Early Good Item" Options - https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3804
Progressive Symbols - https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/3961
Unreachable Audio Logs get joke hints - https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/4558
Add Manifest - https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/5481
Location IDs as Entity IDs (big under the hood system change) - https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/5526
witnessv9.0.0p2.title: 9.0.0 Prerelease 2: Fix added Tutorial check
